statements: SELECT * FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE clicks > 100
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT campaign_name, media_platform FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-08-15'
SELECT campaign_name, conversions FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT media_platform FROM AdvertisingCampaigns ORDER BY media_platform
SELECT * FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT campaign_name, media_platform, budget FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE conversions < 50 ORDER BY budget ASC
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE budget > 50000 AND media_platform = 'Facebook'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget, clicks FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE media_platform IN ('Instagram', 'Google') ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT ad_id, campaign_name, media_platform, ad_cost, impressions, clicks FROM advertising_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, media_platform, ad_cost FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_name, impressions, clicks FROM advertising_campaigns ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_name, media_platform FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE clicks > 100 AND impressions < 5000;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE media_platform = 'Facebook' AND ad_cost < 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, ad_cost, impressions FROM advertising_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, revenue, conversion_rate FROM campaign_performance INNER JOIN advertising_campaigns ON campaign_performance.ad_id = advertising_campaigns.ad_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM advertising_campaigns;
SELECT DISTINCT media_platform FROM advertising_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE platform = 'Facebook';
SELECT campaign_name, platform, start_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, impression_count, timestamp FROM impressions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, click_count FROM ad_campaigns JOIN clicks ON ad_campaigns.id = clicks.campaign_id WHERE clicks.click_count > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, platform, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE platform = 'Facebook' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_impressions FROM impressions;

SELECT campaign_name, platform, start_date, end_date, click_count FROM ad_campaigns INNER JOIN clicks ON ad_campaigns.id = clicks.campaign_id WHERE click_count > 100 ORDER BY click_count DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT campaign_name, platform, start_date, end_date, impression_count, click_count FROM ad_campaigns LEFT JOIN impressions ON ad_campaigns.id = impressions.campaign_id LEFT JOIN clicks ON ad_campaigns.id = clicks.campaign_id WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(impression_count) AS avg_impressions, AVG(click_count) AS avg_clicks FROM impressions JOIN clicks ON impressions.campaign_id = clicks.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, cost, clicks FROM ad_campaigns WHERE media_platform = 'Facebook';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, media_platform FROM ad_campaigns WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, conversions FROM ad_campaigns WHERE clicks > 500 AND conversions > 50;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, cost, clicks FROM ad_campaigns WHERE clicks > 100
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT platform_name, audience_size FROM media_platforms ORDER BY audience_size DESC
SELECT c.campaign_name, p.platform_name, i.impression_date FROM ad_campaigns c JOIN ad_impressions i ON c.campaign_id = i.campaign_id JOIN media_platforms p ON i.platform_id = p.platform_id
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, budget ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, media_platform FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, budget FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(conversions) AS avg_conversions FROM ad_performance;
SELECT platform_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM media_platforms GROUP BY platform_name;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT campaign_name, media_platform FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'

SELECT campaign_name, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM advertising_campaigns JOIN ad_performance ON advertising_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_clicks DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, media_platform, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM ad_engagement WHERE click_through_rate > 3.5 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
